item.title: Building consistency
item.description: Photo by Magda Ehlers The old way So I have currently been consistently learning german for the last 45 day and I am very happy about it. I have tried before but I ususally tap out at a week. This time thugh I was able to go consistenly bo my lesson and see good results from it. I want to talk about what changed and how it can help someone learning a new language.
